reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful, comfortable, and great for various events, with one noting it stays up well without being too tight. Customers disagree on whether the dress is see-through, with some saying it's not at all transparent while others find it slightly see-through.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress
items.body: I bought this dress for a small backyard wedding & it was perfect. Light and cool, but still elegant enough for such a special occasion. The top makes it easy to fit different body types, and it stays up well without being super tight. The fabric isn’t sheer at all as the ruffled skirt offers extra coverage. I wore this dress all day with ease as it’s very comfortable. Fabric is lightweight so I didn’t get hot even with all the ruffles. Fit is very flattering even on my short frame. For reference I’m 4’9” and normally wear a size SP/4. This dress hit floor length for me without heels. Read more
items.author: Jamie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfort, stretchy top, color
items.body: Wore this like 2 months PP and felt beautiful, it’s like not stretchy on the bottom but the style makes it roomy down there. Midi length for sure, it’s soft and flowy do it’s comfortable, not see through. Read more
items.author: Michelle Mondragon

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Flattering and lightweight - cute summer dress!
items.body: I actually liked a lot about this dress - not too see through for a white outfit, the top was stretchy which helped the fit, the length was perfect for me (5’6”) and the material was light weight which helps a strapless dress feel comfy staying up all day. I thought value was good for price point. Arrived horrendously wrinkled and I wasn’t going to have time to iron before the event I wanted to use it for. I ultimately returned after going with a different option but I believe this could be great for anyone who loves the layered skirt look. Read more
items.author: Cami

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tall & short girl approved all my friends ordered this!
items.body: TALL GIRL APPROVED!!! I wore this white dress for my engagement photos and it was absolutely perfect! It photographed beautifully NOT SEE THROUGH & flows light weight and had such a flattering fit without being over the top. What I love most is the functionality and how versatile it is it looked elegant and romantic for photos but it’s also casual enough to wear for brunch, showers, or summer events. The material is lightweight and comfortable, and the quality feels great for the price. Definitely one of those pieces you can dress up or down and feel confident in every time! Read more
items.author: Emma

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Get this dress you wont regret it!
items.body: LOOOOOOOVEEE this dress, so comfortable, the color was spot on. Such a great dress for a summer wedding that is not super formal or even just a brunch date, or just a comfortable outfit to wear out. This is such a versatile piece that can be be worn again and again. I am 5'1 and the length was perfect. The material is good quality, but it can wrinkle pretty easily but to much that it would make return the dress. The pink is not see through just incase anyone was concerned. Read more
items.author: Jenifer Woolley

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars perfect bridal shower dress
items.body: LOVE! bought it for a bridal shower and it is perfect! very cute and flattering and perfect for light weight, sunny weather! fits great (i ordered a small but am bigger busted so i was worried but it fits perfectly), a little see through on the bottom but if you wear shorts you’re fine! the top is stretchy and works great for small or big bust! definitely have to use a steamer the first time but it’s so pretty! great quality! Read more
items.author: Hannah R Richmond

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Wrinkles easily
items.body: This dress is so cute and fits very well.The only thing that I don't like about this dress is the fabric which wrinkles easily and requires ironing after each wash.Since it's a ruffle dress,the ironing is hard and takes a lot of time.So with this price you can have the better choices. Read more
items.author: Eli

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great dress. Better with a belt.
items.body: Bought this for a friend's wedding and added a belt and a blazer for weather purposes. Considering they show it with a belt as possible in the listing, feels like they know it's better with a belt. Wish one came with it. But the thick black one I added looked great. And it covers the somewhat cheap looking seam where the bust piece meets the skirt. It's the main reason I docked a star. That and the material. It's fine. Thin though. I mean, I paid $48. That's not a ton, but it's not nothing. You shouldn't expect something top of the line. But it totally worked for the wedding I was going to. That said, it wrinkles VERY easily. Washes fine. Didn't shrink. Very comfortable to wear. Flattering where the waist line is. And the color was true to the listing. As for sizing... I'm a size 10-12 in bottoms and a L in tops usually, so I bought the L (which said it was for sizes 12-14.) I think I could have fit in the M, but I liked that it fit very comfortably. If you want it crazy tight and your sizing jumps around like mine does based on the product, go down a size. I recommend it. But have realistic expectations. Read more
items.author: Marcia

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Off Shoulder Sleeveless Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Off Shoulder Sleeveless Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Sky, Peacock, Navy, Pink, White, Purple, Yellow, Apricot, Hot Pink, Black, Sage. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
